javadoc: Common interface for MenuItemManager and MenuMangers that are sub-menus.

methods.javadoc: Returns the group for this menu or menuItem.
methods.name: getGroup
methods.comment: Returns the group for this menu or menuItem.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a sub group string that species how this item should be grouped within its 
 primary group, as defined by {@link #getGroup()}.
methods.name: getSubGroup
methods.comment:
Returns a sub group string that species how this item should be grouped within its 
 primary group, as defined by #getGroup().

methods.javadoc:
Returns the text of the menu item.
@return the text of the menu item.
methods.name: getMenuItemText
methods.comment: Returns the text of the menu item.

return.comment: the text of the menu item.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the MenuItem if this is a MenuItemManager or the Menu if this is a MenuManger.
 (Menus are MenuItems)
methods.name: getMenuItem
methods.comment:
Returns the MenuItem if this is a MenuItemManager or the Menu if this is a MenuManger.
 (Menus are MenuItems)

methods.javadoc: Releases all resources used by this object.
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Releases all resources used by this object.

name: ManagedMenuItem
comment: Common interface for MenuItemManager and MenuMangers that are sub-menus.
